title: 装了JAVA7 MC1.5.2还是打不开
author: Rakeyli
txt_content:
我在crash-reports文件夹看到的：
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Don't be sad. I'll do better next time, I promise!

Time: 13-4-13 下午4:48
Description: Failed to start game

java.lang.IllegalStateException: Function is not supported
        at org.lwjgl.BufferChecks.checkFunctionAddress(BufferChecks.java:64)
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.GL11.glMatrixMode(GL11.java:2054)
        at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.J(SourceFile:326)
        at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.a(SourceFile:246)
        at avv.a(SourceFile:56)
        at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.run(SourceFile:507)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)


A detailed walkthrough of the error, its code path and all known details is as follows:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-- System Details --
Details:
        Minecraft Version: 1.5.1
        Operating System: Windows XP (x86) version 5.1
        Java Version: 1.7.0_17, Oracle Corporation
        Java VM Version: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (mixed mode, sharing), Oracle Corporation
        Memory: 8437992 bytes (8 MB) / 28401664 bytes (27 MB) up to 259522560 bytes (247 MB)
        JVM Flags: 0 total; 
        AABB Pool Size: 0 (0 bytes; 0 MB) allocated, 0 (0 bytes; 0 MB) used
        Suspicious classes: No suspicious classes found.
        IntCache: cache: 0, tcache: 0, allocated: 0, tallocated: 0
        LWJGL: 2.4.2
        OpenGL: GeForce GT 610/PCIe/SSE2/3DNOW! GL version 4.3.0, NVIDIA Corporation
        Is Modded: Very likely; Jar signature invalidated
        Type: Client (map_client.txt)
        Texture Pack: Default
        Profiler Position: N/A (disabled)
        Vec3 Pool Size: ~~ERROR~~ NullPointerException: null

replies.author: ylqx1997
replies.txt_content: 我比较感兴趣你1.5.2哪下的

replies.author: wh1999
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 wh1999 于 2013-4-13 20:30 编辑 

我与沙发持相同观点，1.5.2出了？？？看错因明显1.5.1

replies.author: alecone
replies.txt_content: 你下一个纯净版的试试。mcbbs首页，右侧就有。不要弄乱七八糟mod的懒人包。如果你纯净版能玩，那就是你那原来的游戏文件有出问题的。

replies.author: woshouyin
replies.txt_content: 1.5.2？如果楼主没有搞错的话，就是......
